extendedInfo.description: Millions of hands played each month! Try your hand at Chinese Open Face Poker, the hottest new variation of poker out there. Chinese Open Face Poker App's sophisticated design offers users a completely customizable gaming experience and it is the only app to feature popular gaming styles like Fantasy Land and Criss-Cross. This 2-4 player game is played in the same fashion as Chinese Poker and each player makes 3 poker hands out of 13 cards. In Chinese Open Face Poker, players begin with 5 cards and each player draws and places one card at a time until 13 is reached. Bonus points are awarded for making "royalties" like flushes, straights, full houses and four of a kind. For comprehensive online tutorials, visit www.openfacepokerapp.com. From seasoned professionals to brand new poker players, Chinese Open Face Poker App connects thousands of gamers from around the world in poker matches every day!

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Super glitchy. Can\'t change notification settings. Super glitchy. Glitch so hard. Also purchased fantasy island. Reinstalled game, thought it would help with glitches. Purchase is gone. I want my two bucks back. Or pay someone to fixxxx the glitch.
reviews.author: David Zoeller

reviews.title: B.s.that you get adds after paying
reviews.comment: I bought fantasyland and still get adds. That\'s B.S. paid users shouldn\'t get ads. Dev responds quickly, however there are major stability issues with my nexus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wheres android update.. apple has a bluetooth multiplayer. And version 3.0.5

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Since last update, game freezes after last card played in the last game of a set. Don\'t see final score.

reviews.title: Please Fix Glitches
reviews.comment: Everytime I try to open the app my screen flashes twice, tries to log me in a few times then my screen goes blank and reset my phone. Super annoying.

reviews.comment: Great game.  Glitchy as heck. Freezes more that it works

reviews.title: Gallexy s4
reviews.comment: The sign in screen is glitchy. It tells me user name is invalid but it\'s not.  Then it opens many of the sign in screens before it actually signs me in.  Then it won\'t close because too many screens are open.  Please fix.  Thanks
